page.title: 11Uyeasound Primary School.
page.content: Our school is Uyeasound Primary School. In 1985 there were 9 pupils from 7 families from age 5 to 11. Our teacher is also the Head of the school but every week we have visiting teachers for art,music,physical education and remedial education.The Minister takes a class once a month. We have most of our lessons in the new part of the school but we have lessons with visiting teachers in the original school building which in 1984 was joined to the new building by a corridor with indoor toilets. In 1982 the school celebrated its Centenary.In the old building we set out old furniture and books.We wrote with quill pens and dressed in clothes like those worn 100 years ago.
